group.name: Plugin Commands: Manufacturing Library
group.description: CLI commands related to the manufacturing library.

arg.name: lock
arg.description: True means lock, false means unlock.

command.description: Set a token supported by the configuration server.

arg.name: creator
arg.description: True means lock, false means unlock.

arg.name: data
arg.description: Data to use to write the token.

command.description: Read a token supported by the configuration server.
